title: Is it possible to change the Notification Sound so it repeats and the time between repeating?
content: I'm trying to set the notification sound so that it repeats (or if muted, vibrates) more than once. Also, I looking to set the time interval at which it repeats the Notification Sound, example: repeats every 10 or 20 seconds.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
